description: This file provides utility functions for platform detection, specifically checking if the code is running in a browser environment and retrieving the window object if available.

methods.name: export function getWindow<T = any>(): T | undefined { getWindow
methods.description: Returns the window object cast to a generic type if in a browser environment; otherwise undefined.

ctags.name: isBrowser
ctags.pattern: /^export const isBrowser = typeof window !== 'undefined' && typeof document !== 'undefined';$/
